channel.title: Staffs?
channel.description: Now this might be a stupid question, but can the "Staff of light" use the normal spellbook or only the ancients..same goes with the "Chaotic staff". Never maged before and just wonder, yet better to word my reason of not knowing is that I never ever had one of these items before, so I would like to know :) Thanks for your help

item.title: Staffs?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

The only staff that has a restriction is the Ancient Staff iirc.

Read full topic

they use whatever spellbook you set them on
